Summary: I saw 3 yellow-orange lights come on in the shape of a long triangle..have picture of what I saw
divs: Sighting Detailstriangular in shape, 3 yellow-orange lights, all were stationary.. got a picture.....the lights then went off. did not see any shape to object just the triangular shape in the lights. Have never seen anything like it before in my 63 years. I was trying to relax away from the computer....looking at television, and looked out my 6th floor window. Not much of a narrative . Thank you.... I did get a good digital photo
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were 2 other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around June 1st 2013
